update hou_entrust_info set LOCK_EID = NULL, LOCK_TIME = NULL where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HOU_ENTRUST_INFO A WHERE A.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND A.STATUS = 0 AND (DATE_ADD(A.LOCK_TIME, INTERVAL 30 DAY_MINUTE) < SYSDATE() OR ISNULL(a.LOCK_TIME) OR A.LOCK_EID = #{lockEid}) AND EXISTS ( SELECT B.COMP_ID FROM HOU_ENTRUST_COMP_LINK B WHERE B.MAIN_ID = A.ID AND B.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND B.COMP_ID = #{compId} )
SELECT COUNT(1) COUNT FROM sys_code WHERE TYPE = 'surname' AND NAME = #{name}
